AISettings.name: ai.addignoreplayer
AISettings.description: Adds the target ID to the NPCs ignore-list, meaning that they wonâ€™t be targeted by hostile AI.

AISettings.name: ai.brainstats
AISettings.description: Prints the amount of 'brains' on the map. Each AI has 1 brain.

AISettings.name: ai.clearignoredplayers
AISettings.description: Clears the ignore-list, meaning everyone is targettable by the AI.

AISettings.name: ai.killanimals
AISettings.description: Kills all animals on the server.

AISettings.name: ai.killscientists
AISettings.description: Kills all scientists on the server.

AISettings.name: ai.printignoredplayers
AISettings.description: Prints the list of currently ignored players to the console.

AISettings.name: ai.removeignoreplayer
AISettings.description: Removes the target ID from the NPCs ignore-list, meaning that they will be targeted by hostile AI.

AISettings.name: attackentity.print_ai_stats
AISettings.description: Prints various AI stats to the console, including AI Difficulty, Effective Range Scale, Damage Scale, Attack Length Scale, Aim Cone Scale, Attack Spacing Scale, and Attack Cooldown Scale.
